channel.title: Comments on: Closing in on Gabriel’s topos?

item.title: By: David Roberts

item.description: And now the talks from Como are up! <a href="https://youtu.be/dDm0wxnawJE" rel="nofollow ugc">Connes part 1</a>, <a href="https://youtu.be/tqZZjvFUG8A" rel="nofollow ugc">Connes part 2</a>.
item.content:encoded:
And now the talks from Como are up!
Connes part 1,
Connes part 2.

item.title: By: David Roberts

item.description: And the slides for Connes' slides from Bristol are here: https://heilbronn.ac.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/Connes-Talk.pdf
item.content:encoded: And the slides for Connes’ slides from Bristol are here: https://heilbronn.ac.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/Connes-Talk.pdf

item.title: By: just.a.comment
item.dc:creator: just.a.comment
item.description: And there's been in the last few days a <a href="https://heilbronn.ac.uk/2017/08/08/perspectives-on-the-riemann-hypothesis/" rel="nofollow ugc">conference on RH in Bristol</a>, where both Sawin and Connes spoke, among many others. On his blog Terry Tao says the lectures were recorded.
item.content:encoded: And there’s been in the last few days a conference on RH in Bristol, where both Sawin and Connes spoke, among many others. On his blog Terry Tao says the lectures were recorded.
